title: Associação Madeirense promotora do Bem Publico e do Auxilio Mútuo
original_title: Associação Madeirense promotora do Bem Publico e do Auxilio Mútuo
body: It was founded in 1877, due to the initiative of Dr. João da Câmara Leme, later Count of Canavial, and had a short duration. In the project of its statutes, the associates were given the right to borrow money from the association's treasury at an interest of five percent.

1877: Foundation of the Associação Madeirense promotora do Bem Publico e do Auxilio Mútuo
